intro.p: Aside from the usual AddComponent overloads exposed by the MicroKernel, you can use a few differents selection of methods for specific situations.

section.title: Crafting a component instance
section.p: The AddCustomComponent allows you to register a ComponentModel directly. The ModelBuilder will be totally skipped from the process.

section.title: Adding a component with extended properties
section.p: The ComponentModel exposes an Extended Properties dictionary which is used to store entries that can be used by facilities or subsystem. Facilities developers may find the method AddComponentWithExtendedProperties useful.
